DOC.detailed_description: The present study single-center , prospective diagnostic study among patient present ED ICU within 24 h onset chest pain suggestive suspect ACS . We propose construct biobank ACS evaluate potential diagnostic value circulate microRNAs compare cTnI suspect ACS patient . All patient follow 6 month . Final diagnosis make expert panel cardiologist , base available clinical information include cTnI measurement , ECG , coronary angiography , cardiac exercise test information hospital discharge letter . The concentration microRNAs evaluate quantitative reverse transcription PCR , use highly specific primer hybridization probe .
DOC.criteria: Suspected ACS patient ( STEMI , NSTEMI , UA ) : Age > 18 year ; Informed consent . Patients undergo immediate PCI ; Pregnant lactate woman ; Patients mental disorder ; Patients use experimental drug ; Refusal provide inform .
